name: Creative Realities, Inc.
description: Creative Realities, Inc. is a leading provider of digital marketing and interactive solutions that enhance customer engagement and drive brand loyalty. Founded in 2009, the company specializes in delivering innovative technologies that transform the way brands communicate with their audiences. With a focus on the retail and hospitality sectors, Creative Realities designs and implements engaging digital signage, interactive kiosks, and mobile solutions that create immersive customer experiences. The company leverages its expertise in software development and hardware integration to offer clients comprehensive solutions tailored to their specific needs. Creative Realities is committed to helping businesses optimize their marketing strategies through data-driven insights and analytics, enabling them to better understand customer behaviors and preferences. With a diverse portfolio of clients, ranging from large multinational corporations to small businesses, Creative Realities continues to expand its footprint in the digital marketing space, driving innovation and enhancing the customer journey.
ceo: Richard D. G. G. R. S. P. S. F. C. S. R. L. B.

key_executives.name: Richard D. G. G. R. S. P. S. F. C. S. R. L. B.

faq.answer: Creative Realities is headquartered in Louisville, Kentucky, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products offered by Creative Realities?
faq.answer: Creative Realities offers products including interactive displays, video walls, kiosks, and mobile applications.
